description: This file contains FastAPI dependency functions for authentication and authorization, including current user retrieval and recipe ownership validation.

methods.name: User current_user(db: Session = Depends(get_db), token_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Dependency function to retrieve the currently authenticated user based on the token.

methods.name: Recipe recipe_owned_by_current_user( recipe_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(current_user), )
methods.description: Dependency function to verify the specified recipe exists and is owned by the current user.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] build_paginated_response( items: List[Any], total: int, page: int, page_size: int, )
Tuple[int,int] get_pagination_params(page: int = 1, page_size: int = 20, max_page_size: int = 100)
login(form_data: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
register(form: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(), db: Session = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: build_paginated_response
ctags.signature: ( items: List[Any], total: int, page: int, page_size: int, )

ctags.name: current_user
ctags.pattern: /^def current_user(db: Session = Depends(get_db), token_user: User = Depends(get_current_user)) ->/

ctags.name: get_pagination_params
ctags.pattern: /^def get_pagination_params(page: int = 1, page_size: int = 20, max_page_size: int = 100) -> Tuple/

ctags.name: login
ctags.pattern: /^def login(form_data: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(), db: Session = Depends(get_db)):$/

ctags.name: recipe_owned_by_current_user
ctags.signature: ( recipe_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(current_user), )

ctags.name: register
ctags.pattern: /^def register(form: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(), db: Session = Depends(get_db)):$/
